troubles - but I have a 360 blog that I use when I can
get to it! http://360.yahoo.com/jessradtke



Jessica

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] calling all bloggers
messages.msgSnippet: Stupid yahoo. I tried, you can load up to three RSS feeds, but everyone I input it says it can t access it. }:-/ Maybe I ll get DH to work on it. Like he
messages.messageBody:
Stupid yahoo. I tried, you can load up to three RSS feeds, but
everyone I input it says it can't access it. }:-/

Maybe I'll get DH to work on it. Like he doesn't work with computer
illiterate people all day at work, and there he gets paid for it.
Melissa
Mom to Josh (11), Breanna (8), Emily (7), Rachel (6), Sam (4), Dan
(2), and Avari Rose

share our lives at
http://360.yahoo.com/multimomma

From: Melissa
Date: 05/25/06 20:18:03
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] calling all bloggers

Eh? "It's like she's speaking to me, I just know it!" Seriously.
What's a blogroll? I know I can add an RSS feed, but on blogger I
don't know how to find the feed, just on other yahoo blogs. I'm a
slow learner....took me this long just to get a blog!

Thanks for the hint!
Melissa

(2), and Avari Rose
